channel.title: How do I make mulitple npc's say something?
channel.description: Ok i have the tyras guards in varrock say something for testscape of course...anyways how do i make the lvl 2 man in the dummies say something?

item.title: How do I make mulitple npc's say something?
item.dc:creator: @Pizz4_0wnz Pizz4 0wnz
item.description:
@Pizz4_0wnz wrote:

ok i C&P if (npcs[i].npcType == 1) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Don't kill me please!I'm only a pregnant man!"; } }

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make mulitple npc's say something?

item.title: How do I make mulitple npc's say something?

item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

or you can just copy the way they talk and change the ids probably easier for you
